topic.title: dBPoweramp (NinjaBeats)
topic.body:
1) Uninstall older versions - IMPORTANT!
2) Install dbPowerAmp by running "dMC-R15.0-Ref-Registered.exe"
3) Do not update the application
4) Enjoy!

Thanks to original supplier and ChingLiu for cracking it.
______________________________
Distributed by NinjaBeats. If you like this product and want the latest version, consider buying it from the original supplier! :)

dBPoweramp official website: https://www.dbpoweramp.com/purchase.htm

NinjaBeats website: http://127.0.0.1:43110/15F9LYs6c17NUXv3MxpJSGbpWxyHTEbzMk/
